dcterms:creator: X. Zhang
J. Zhao
Y. LeCun
dcterms:description: A dataset used to evaluate how the model is able to change the sentiment of the original text and achieve the target sentiment, characterized by informal text seen in realistic user inputs.
dcterms:title: YELP Sentiment Dataset

dcterms:creator: A. L. Maas
R. E. Daly
P. T. Pham
D. Huang
A. Y. Ng
C. Potts
dcterms:description: A dataset used to further evaluate how the model is able to change the sentiment of the original input text, characterized by long and complex text, making it a challenging dataset.
dcterms:title: IMDB Sentiment Dataset
